divs: Sighting DetailsIt was night and my kids and I were just getting things cleaned up in the house when my 9 year old went outside to take the trash out when he came running in yelling for me to come outside he sees a UFO. I told him to stopped playing and to help clean he kept at me and kept at me so I figured okay go with it. So I went outside and he showed me where it was and i told him that it was a plane then i second guessed myself and said no that aint its got green red and white init so then i told him it just a helicopter then well i noticed it was NOT MOVING i figured okay this is tooo weird. I knew that there was no such thing. But i am rethinking that now. I dont know how to explain its shape other than it was like the ones on the movies. The thing just sat there in the sky i got my binoculars and looked through them and the bottom was moving REALLY REALLY slow but it just sat in the sky. my kids are believeing in UFO's but me I really dont know i just think that if i had more to see or proven i would believe. I never lost sight but i gave up and went to bed at about 10:30 11 o'clock and it was still there
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Brigham City
There were no other sightings in Brigham City on or around February 14th 2011
